heroes.name: Miya
heroes.lore: Miya is an elf archer from the Moon Elf tribe. She was chosen as the Moonlight Archer to protect her people and the Moon Temple. With her exceptional archery skills and connection to the moon, she fights to maintain balance in the world.
heroes.background: As the last Moon Elf princess, Miya carries the hopes of her people. She wields the sacred Moonlight Bow, a weapon passed down through generations of Moon Elf guardians.
heroes.playstyle: Miya is a classic marksman who excels at dealing sustained physical damage from a distance. She becomes increasingly powerful as the game progresses and she completes her core items.

recommendedBuilds.name: Critical Strike Build
recommendedBuilds.description: High critical chance build that maximizes damage output in team fights.

tips: Stay behind tanks in team fights
Use ultimate to avoid crowd control
Position carefully against assassins

skills.name: Fission Shot
skills.description: Miya enhances her basic attacks, causing them to split and deal damage to multiple enemies. Each split arrow deals reduced damage to non-primary targets.

skills.name: Arrow of Eclipse
skills.description: Miya fires a powerful arrow in a designated direction, dealing physical damage to enemies in its path and stunning the first enemy hero hit.

skills.name: Turret Mode
skills.description: Miya removes all slow effects and gains increased attack speed and movement speed. During this time, her basic attacks will continuously trigger Fission Shot.

skills.name: Moon Blessing
skills.description: Each time Miya's skills hit an enemy hero, she gains an attack speed stack. Stacks up to 5 times.

combos.name: Basic Harass Combo
sequence: Skill 2 if enemy tries to escape
combos.description: Standard poke combo using enhanced basic attacks for harassment.

combos.name: Team Fight Combo
combos.description: Maximum damage output during team fights with ultimate active.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Miya's original appearance as the Moon Elf archer.

skins.name: Suzuhime
skins.description: A Japanese-themed skin that transforms Miya into a graceful geisha.

skins.name: Captain Pink
skins.description: A cute and colorful skin with pink-themed effects.

trivia: Miya was one of the original heroes in Mobile Legends
She is often recommended as a beginner-friendly marksman
Her Suzuhime skin was part of the first collaboration with Japanese culture

heroes.name: Balmond
heroes.lore: Balmond is a fierce orc warrior from the Barren Lands who wields a massive axe. He leads his orc tribe with strength and ferocity, seeking to prove orc might to the world.
heroes.background: As chieftain of the Bloodaxe Orcs, Balmond has united the scattered orc tribes under his banner through sheer combat prowess and strategic genius.
heroes.playstyle: Balmond is a durable fighter who excels at sustained combat and area damage. His ultimate can execute low-health enemies, making him deadly in team fights.

recommendedBuilds.name: Sustain Fighter Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Build focused on durability and sustain in extended fights.

tips: Use Skill 2 to clear waves quickly
Save ultimate for executing low-health targets

skills.name: Soul Lock
skills.description: Balmond locks onto an enemy, dealing physical damage and slowing them. The target takes extra damage from Balmond's other skills.

skills.name: Cyclone Sweep
skills.description: Balmond spins his axe, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. He gains movement speed while spinning.

skills.name: Lethal Counter
skills.description: Balmond leaps and slams his axe down, dealing true damage to enemies in an area. Deals extra damage to low-health enemies.

skills.name: Bloodthirst
skills.description: Balmond gains HP regeneration based on his maximum HP. When his HP is low, the regeneration is significantly increased.

combos.name: Wave Clear Combo
combos.description: Efficient wave clearing combo for lane control.

combos.name: Team Fight Combo
combos.description: Team fight combo that maximizes area damage and executes.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Balmond's original appearance as the orc chieftain.

skins.name: Great Commander
skins.description: A commander-themed skin that gives Balmond a more strategic appearance.

dialogues.text: Feel the might of the orcs!

trivia: Balmond was one of the original heroes in Mobile Legends
His ultimate was reworked to deal true damage instead of physical damage
He is often used as a beginner-friendly fighter

heroes.name: Saber
heroes.lore: Saber is a cyborg assassin from the Laboratory. Originally a human soldier, he was nearly killed in battle and rebuilt with advanced technology to become the perfect killing machine.
heroes.background: Saber was once a elite soldier who suffered catastrophic injuries in combat. The Laboratory offered him a second chance by reconstructing his body with cybernetic enhancements.
heroes.playstyle: Saber is a single-target assassin who excels at eliminating key enemy heroes. His ultimate allows him to lock down and burst down squishy targets with precision.

recommendedBuilds.name: Jungle Assassin Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Standard jungle build that provides damage, sustain, and cooldown reduction.

tips: Use ultimate on high-priority targets
Save Skill 2 to escape after engaging
Coordinate with team for successful ganks

skills.name: Orbiting Swords
skills.description: Saber summons flying swords that orbit around him, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. The swords also enhance his next basic attack.

skills.name: Charge
skills.description: Saber charges forward, dealing physical damage to enemies in his path. Hitting an enemy hero reduces the cooldown of Orbiting Swords.

skills.name: Triple Sweep
skills.description: Saber locks onto an enemy hero, stunning them and unleashing a series of sword strikes that deal massive physical damage.

skills.name: Enemy's Bane
skills.description: Saber's skills reduce the target's physical defense for a short duration.

combos.name: Gank Combo
combos.description: Standard ganking combo that maximizes damage output.

combos.name: Surprise Attack Combo
combos.description: Ambush combo that catches enemies off guard.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Saber's original appearance as the cyborg assassin.

skins.name: Flaming Shadow
skins.description: A fiery-themed skin that gives Saber a more menacing appearance.

trivia: Saber was one of the first assassins in Mobile Legends
His ultimate cannot be purified by most effects
He is often used as a counter to mobile heroes

heroes.name: Alice
heroes.lore: Alice is a powerful blood demon who rules over the Crimson Heart Castle. Once a human princess, she made a pact with dark forces to gain eternal youth and power, transforming into a vampire queen who feeds on blood to maintain her beauty and strength.
heroes.background: As the Blood Demon Queen, Alice commands legions of darkness from her crimson castle. She seeks to expand her domain and acquire more blood orbs to increase her power indefinitely.
heroes.playstyle: Alice is a sustain mage who excels in prolonged team fights. She grows stronger throughout the match by collecting blood orbs from minions and heroes, gaining permanent max HP and regen. Her ultimate allows her to dive into battles while healing massively.

recommendedBuilds.name: Sustain Mage Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Standard mage build focusing on sustain and magic power scaling.

recommendedBuilds.name: Tanky Mage Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Durable build that maximizes Alice's sustain in extended fights.

tips: Stack blood orbs from minions early game
Use ultimate when surrounded by enemies
Build anti-heal items against her
Avoid extended fights against her

skills.name: Flowing Blood
skills.description: Alice summons a blood vortex at the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing them. The vortex explodes after a short delay, dealing additional damage.

skills.name: Blood Awe
skills.description: Alice releases blood energy in a cone, dealing magic damage to enemies and stunning them. She also gains a shield based on the number of enemies hit.

skills.name: Blood Ode
skills.description: Alice enters blood rage, continuously draining HP from nearby enemies while healing herself. She gains movement speed and reduces the cooldown of her other skills during this state.

skills.name: Blood Ancestry
skills.description: Alice permanently gains 10 max HP and 0.5 HP regen for every blood orb collected. Minions drop 1 orb, heroes drop 2 orbs upon death.

combos.name: Basic Combo
combos.description: Standard poke and engage combo for lane harassment.

combos.name: Team Fight Combo
combos.description: Aggressive engage combo to dive into team fights and disrupt enemies.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Alice's original appearance as the Blood Demon Queen.

skins.name: Steam Glider
skins.description: A steampunk-themed skin featuring mechanical wings and gear-based effects.

skins.name: Divine Owl
skins.description: An elegant skin that transforms Alice into a divine owl spirit with celestial effects.

trivia: Alice was one of the first mage/tank hybrids in Mobile Legends
Her blood orb passive was reworked to be more impactful
She is known for her strong late-game scaling
The Divine Owl skin is considered one of her most popular skins

heroes.name: Nana
heroes.lore: Nana is a young Harlequin Mage from the Magical Forest who wields powerful transformation magic. Despite her childish appearance, she possesses immense magical abilities and travels with her trusted companion, Molina, causing mischief and protecting the innocent.
heroes.background: As the last of the Harlequin Mage tribe, Nana uses her magical powers to play tricks on evildoers while maintaining her cheerful and playful demeanor. Her signature transformation spell has frustrated countless enemies on the battlefield.
heroes.playstyle: Nana is a utility mage who excels at crowd control and disrupting enemy formations. She can transform enemies into harmless creatures, set traps with her boomerang, and provide vision control with Molina.

recommendedBuilds.name: Burst Mage Build
recommendedBuilds.description: High magic damage build focused on bursting down enemies with skill combos.

recommendedBuilds.name: Support Utility Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Utility-focused build that provides crowd control and anti-heal for the team.

tips: Use Skill 2 to protect yourself from divers
Place Molina in bushes for vision
Combo Ultimate after transformation for guaranteed hits
Save passive for crucial moments

skills.name: Boomerang
skills.description: Nana throws a magical boomerang that deals magic damage to enemies along its path. The boomerang returns to Nana, dealing damage again on the way back.

skills.name: Molina Smooch
skills.description: Nana sends Molina to a target location. After a short delay, Molina will chase nearby enemies and transform the first enemy hero hit into a harmless Molina for 1.5 seconds.

skills.name: Molina Blaze
skills.description: Nana summons a large magic circle that deals magic damage to enemies within it and slows them. After 1 second, the circle explodes, dealing magic damage again and knocking up enemies.

skills.name: Molina's Gift
skills.description: When Nana takes fatal damage, she transforms into a Molina for 2 seconds, becoming untargetable and gaining movement speed. This effect has a 120-second cooldown.

combos.name: Basic Harass Combo
combos.description: Safe poke combo using boomerang to harass from distance.

combos.name: Full Burst Combo
combos.description: Maximum damage combo when enemy is transformed.

combos.name: Team Fight Combo
combos.description: Team fight disruption combo focusing on crowd control.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Nana's original appearance as the cheerful Harlequin Mage.

skins.name: Clockwork Maid
skins.description: A steampunk-themed skin featuring Nana as a mechanical maid.

skins.name: Aqua Pura
skins.description: A water-themed skin with aquatic effects and animations.

skins.name: Slumber Party
skins.description: A cute pajama party skin featuring Nana in sleepwear.

trivia: Nana was one of the original heroes in Mobile Legends
She is consistently one of the most popular heroes due to her easy gameplay
Her transformation skill is one of the most frustrating abilities for enemy assassins
Nana has one of the highest ban rates in lower ranks
She can be played effectively in multiple roles

heroes.name: Tigreal
heroes.lore: Tigreal is a holy knight of the Moniyan Empire, known for his unwavering loyalty and immense strength. As the captain of the Imperial Knights, he fights to protect the empire and its people from all threats.
heroes.background: Tigreal comes from a long line of knights who have served the Moniyan Empire. He trained since childhood to uphold justice and protect the innocent.
heroes.playstyle: Tigreal is a frontline tank who excels at initiating team fights and protecting his allies. His crowd control abilities make him excellent at setting up kills and disrupting enemy formations.

recommendedBuilds.name: Standard Tank Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Balanced tank build that provides both physical and magical defense.

tips: Use Flicker + Ultimate for surprise initiations
Save Skill 2 to interrupt channeling abilities

skills.name: Attack Wave
skills.description: Tigreal slams his hammer on the ground, sending a shockwave forward that deals magic damage to enemies and slows them.

skills.name: Sacred Hammer
skills.description: Tigreal charges forward, dealing magic damage to enemies in his path and knocking them aside. At the end of his charge, he swings his hammer to knock enemies airborne.

skills.name: Implosion
skills.description: Tigreal gathers energy, pulling nearby enemies toward him and stunning them. The stun duration increases with channel time.

skills.name: Fearless
skills.description: When Tigreal's HP falls below 40%, he gains extra physical and magical defense for a short duration.

combos.name: Initiation Combo
sequence: Skill 2 to push enemies into team
combos.description: Surprise initiation that catches multiple enemies in ultimate.

combos.name: Peel Combo
combos.description: Defensive combo to protect carries from divers.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Tigreal's original appearance as the holy knight.

skins.name: Dark Knight
skins.description: A dark alternative version of Tigreal with sinister-themed effects.

trivia: Tigreal is often considered the quintessential tank hero
His Flicker + Ultimate combo is one of the most iconic in the game
He received a major rework in 2018 that improved his abilities

heroes.name: Alucard
heroes.lore: Alucard is a demon hunter who wields a massive sword. He was once a human, but after being betrayed and left for dead, he was resurrected as a half-demon. Now he seeks revenge against those who wronged him while struggling to control his demonic powers.
heroes.background: Once a proud knight of the Moniyan Empire, Alucard was betrayed by his comrades during a critical battle. Left for dead, he was found by demons who offered him power in exchange for his humanity.
heroes.playstyle: Alucard is a high-mobility fighter who excels at chasing down enemies and sustaining through fights with his lifesteal abilities. He's most effective when he can stick to targets and continuously deal damage.

recommendedBuilds.name: Standard Lifesteal Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Balanced build focusing on sustain and damage. Perfect for extended fights and dueling.

tips: Use Flicker to escape Khufra's bounce
Avoid engaging when Akai has ultimate ready

skills.name: Pursuit
skills.description: Alucard dashes in the specified direction, dealing physical damage to enemies in his path.

skills.name: Groundsplitter
skills.description: Alucard splits the ground while moving to specified direction.

skills.name: Whirling Smash
skills.description: Alucard launches a whirling slash in a round direction.

skills.name: Fission Wave
skills.description: Alucard absorbs the energy of enemies in the target area, reducing their movement Speed and then releases a shockwave in the target direction.

heroes.name: Karina
heroes.lore: Karina is a deadly assassin from the Shadow Guards of the Moniyan Empire. As the adopted daughter of Tigreal and the sister of Fanny, she wields twin blades infused with dark magic to eliminate her targets with ruthless efficiency.
heroes.background: Trained in the art of assassination since childhood, Karina became the youngest member of the Shadow Guards. Her exceptional skills and cold demeanor make her one of the most feared assassins in the Land of Dawn.
heroes.playstyle: Karina is a magic damage assassin who excels at eliminating squishy targets. She relies on hitting enemies with her basic attacks after using skills to trigger her passive, dealing massive true damage. Her ultimate allows her to dash through multiple enemies.

recommendedBuilds.name: Jungle Burst Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Standard jungle build focusing on maximum burst damage for ganking.

recommendedBuilds.name: Mid Lane Assassin
recommendedBuilds.description: Mid lane build that provides sustained damage and survivability.

tips: Use Skill 1 to dodge crowd control
Wait for enemies to use key skills before engaging
Combo with basic attacks between skills
Target squishy heroes first in team fights
Use ultimate to reposition or escape

skills.name: Shadow Assault
skills.description: Karina dashes in a designated direction, dealing magic damage to enemies along her path. If this skill hits an enemy hero, its cooldown is reduced by 80%.

skills.name: Dance of Blades
skills.description: Karina swings her twin blades, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies. She also gains a shield that absorbs damage and blocks the next basic attack from an enemy hero.

skills.name: Death Resentence
skills.description: Karina dashes to a target enemy hero, dealing magic damage and marking them with a death sentence. The mark detonates after a short delay, dealing additional magic damage.

skills.name: Shadow Combo
skills.description: Karina's skills mark enemies with a shadow. When Karina hits a marked enemy with a basic attack, she deals extra true damage equal to a percentage of the enemy's lost HP and refreshes all her skill cooldowns by 1.5 seconds.

combos.name: Basic Gank Combo
combos.description: Standard ganking combo for eliminating single targets.

combos.name: Team Fight Combo
combos.description: Team fight combo focusing on quick eliminations and repositioning.

combos.name: Max Burst Combo
combos.description: Maximum damage combo using all skills with basic attacks between them.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Karina's original appearance as the Shadow Guard assassin.

skins.name: Black Pearl
skins.description: A pirate-themed skin featuring Karina as a deadly pirate captain.

skins.name: Phantom Blade
skins.description: A futuristic skin with neon effects and high-tech blades.

skins.name: Jingu Bang
skins.description: A Journey to the West themed skin where Karina wields Sun Wukong's legendary staff.

trivia: Karina was one of the first magic damage assassins in Mobile Legends
Her passive reset mechanic makes her excellent at securing multiple kills in team fights
She is particularly strong against marksman and mage heroes
Karina's Skill 1 can be used to dodge crucial crowd control abilities
She received a significant rework that changed her ultimate ability

heroes.name: Akai
heroes.lore: Akai is a powerful panda warrior who was once the guardian of the Bamboo Forest. After his home was destroyed by dark forces, he now wanders the Land of Dawn seeking to protect the innocent and master his martial arts.
heroes.background: As the last of the Panda Warriors, Akai combines immense physical strength with surprising agility. Despite his bulky appearance, he moves with grace and precision, using his body as both weapon and shield.
heroes.playstyle: Akai is a crowd control tank who excels at disrupting enemy formations and protecting allies. His ultimate allows him to push enemies around the battlefield, while his shield provides sustain in fights.

recommendedBuilds.name: Roam Tank Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Standard roam build focusing on crowd control and team support.

recommendedBuilds.name: Exp Lane Bruiser
recommendedBuilds.description: Fighter build that provides sustain and damage for the exp lane.

tips: Use Skill 1 to cancel channeling abilities
Flicker + Ultimate combo for surprise engages
Position to push enemies into your team
Use Skill 2 to absorb damage for allies
Save ultimate for key targets in team fights

skills.name: Thousand Pounder
skills.description: Akai jumps to a designated location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area and slowing them. If Akai lands on an enemy hero, the cooldown is reduced by 30%.

skills.name: Blender
skills.description: Akai spins rapidly, gaining a shield and dealing magic damage to nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds. He can move while spinning and the shield stacks with each enemy hit.

skills.name: Hurricane Dance
skills.description: Akai becomes immune to crowd control and spins violently, pushing enemies along with him. He gains increased movement speed and deals magic damage to enemies he pushes.

skills.name: Tai Chi
skills.description: Every 6 seconds, Akai's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage and stuns the target for 1 second. Using skills reduces the cooldown of this effect by 1 second.

combos.name: Basic Engage Combo
combos.description: Standard engagement combo for initiating fights.

combos.name: Flicker Ultimate Combo
combos.description: Surprise engage combo using Flicker to catch enemies off guard.

combos.name: Peel Combo
combos.description: Defensive combo to protect your carries from assassins.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Akai's original appearance as the Panda Warrior.

skins.name: Royal Musketeer
skins.description: A royal guard themed skin with elegant armor and effects.

skins.name: Vanguard Elite
skins.description: A futuristic military skin with high-tech armor and effects.

skins.name: Samurai Panda
skins.description: A Japanese samurai themed skin featuring Akai as a legendary warrior.

skins.name: Street Pop
skins.description: A vibrant street art themed skin with graffiti effects.

dialogues.text: Balance is the key to victory!

trivia: Akai was one of the original heroes in Mobile Legends
He received a major rework that completely changed his skill set
His ultimate is one of the most disruptive crowd control abilities in the game
Akai is particularly effective against mobile assassins and divers
He can use Flicker while channeling his ultimate for surprise engages
Akai is often picked in professional matches for his reliable crowd control

heroes.name: Franco
heroes.lore: Franco is a hulking executioner from the Moniyan Empire who wields a massive anchor. Once a prisoner himself, he now serves as the empire's most feared enforcer.
heroes.background: Franco was sentenced to life in prison but earned his freedom by single-handedly defeating a prison riot. He now serves as the empire's executioner.
heroes.playstyle: Franco is a hook-based tank who excels at picking off key enemies with his signature Iron Hook. His ultimate provides reliable suppression.

recommendedBuilds.name: Roam Tank Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Standard roam build that maximizes durability and utility.

tips: Use bushes to hide hook animations
Coordinate with team after successful hooks
Save ultimate for high-priority targets

skills.name: Iron Hook
skills.description: Franco throws his hook in a straight line, pulling the first enemy hit to him and dealing magic damage.

skills.name: Fury Shock
skills.description: Franco smashes the ground, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing them.

skills.name: Bloody Hunt
skills.description: Franco suppresses an enemy hero, dealing continuous magic damage. The target cannot move or use skills during the suppression.

skills.name: Wasteland Force
skills.description: Franco gains extra physical and magical defense based on his maximum HP.

combos.name: Pick Off Combo
combos.description: Standard combo for catching and eliminating isolated targets.

combos.name: Team Fight Combo
combos.description: Team fight initiation that removes key targets from the fight.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Franco's original appearance as the empire's executioner.

skins.name: Captain Thorns
skins.description: A pirate-themed skin that transforms Franco into a fearsome sea captain.

skins.name: Halloween
skins.description: A spooky Halloween-themed skin perfect for the season.

trivia: Franco's hook is one of the most iconic abilities in MLBB
A good Franco player can completely change the game with well-timed hooks
He is often banned in lower ranks due to his pick potential

heroes.name: Bane
heroes.lore: Bane is a cursed pirate captain who commands the power of the sea. Once human, he was transformed into his current monstrous form by a powerful curse.
heroes.background: Bane was a legendary pirate captain who sought the treasure of the abyssal gods. He found it, but at the cost of his humanity, becoming the monster he is today.
heroes.playstyle: Bane is a unique fighter/mage hybrid who excels at poking and pushing lanes. His ultimate summons a ghost ship that devastates team fights.

recommendedBuilds.name: Hybrid Push Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Hybrid build that provides both physical and magical damage for maximum push potential.

tips: Use Skill 1 to poke from distance
Position ultimate to hit multiple enemies
Split push when ultimate is available

skills.name: Crab Claws
skills.description: Bane summons crab claws that move forward, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and slowing them.

skills.name: Rum
skills.description: Bane drinks rum, healing himself and enhancing his next basic attack to deal extra magic damage and slow the target.

skills.name: Deadly Catch
skills.description: Bane summons a ghost ship that sails forward, dealing massive magic damage to enemies hit and knocking them aside.

skills.name: Shark Bite
skills.description: Bane's basic attacks deal extra magic damage. After using a skill, his next basic attack deals additional damage.

combos.name: Poke Combo
sequence: Skill 2 for heal and enhanced basic attack
combos.description: Sustainable poke combo that also provides healing.

combos.name: Team Fight Combo
combos.description: Team fight combo that maximizes area damage and disruption.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Bane's original appearance as the cursed pirate.

skins.name: Deep Sea Rescuer
skins.description: A deep-sea diver themed skin with bubble effects.

trivia: Bane was completely reworked in 2019, changing from a pure physical hero to a hybrid
His ghost ship ultimate is one of the most visually impressive abilities in the game
He is one of the few heroes who can effectively deal both physical and magical damage

heroes.name: Bruno
heroes.lore: Bruno is a professional soccer player from the Moniyan Empire who uses his incredible ball control skills in combat. He fights with style and precision.
heroes.background: Bruno was the star player of the Moniyan Empire's national soccer team before being recruited for his exceptional agility and precision.
heroes.playstyle: Bruno is a mobile marksman who excels at kiting and dealing burst damage. His passive provides critical chance, making him scale well into late game.

recommendedBuilds.name: Critical Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Standard critical build that maximizes Bruno's passive critical chance.

tips: Use Skill 2 to reposition in fights
Aim Skill 1 to bounce off walls for maximum damage

skills.name: Volley Shot
skills.description: Bruno kicks a energy ball that moves forward, dealing physical damage to enemies hit. The ball bounces off walls.

skills.name: Flying Tackle
skills.description: Bruno dashes in the specified direction. His next basic attack will be enhanced, dealing extra physical damage.

skills.name: Wave of the World
skills.description: Bruno kicks a giant energy ball that moves slowly forward, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and stunning them.

skills.name: Mecha Legs
skills.description: Bruno gains critical chance with each basic attack. Stacks up to 10 times. Critical hits reduce skill cooldowns.

combos.name: Poke Combo
combos.description: Safe poke combo that maintains distance from enemies.

combos.name: Burst Combo
combos.description: All-in combo that maximizes damage output.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Bruno's original appearance as the soccer star.

skins.name: Vanguard Elite
skins.description: A futuristic military-themed skin.

skins.name: Striker
skins.description: A classic soccer uniform skin with sporty effects.

trivia: Bruno was one of the first soccer-themed heroes in MLBB
His bouncing ball mechanic is unique among marksmen
He received visual updates in 2020 that improved his model

heroes.name: Clint
heroes.lore: Clint is a lone gunslinger from the Moniyan Empire's frontier. With his trusty revolver and quick draw, he dispenses justice one bullet at a time.
heroes.background: Formerly a lawman in the frontier towns, Clint now wanders the Land of Dawn as a bounty hunter, taking on contracts that align with his sense of justice.
heroes.playstyle: Clint is a burst-oriented marksman who relies on skill combos rather than sustained basic attacks. His passive enhances his basic attacks after using skills.

recommendedBuilds.name: Burst Damage Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Build focused on maximizing burst damage through skill combos.

tips: Use Skill 2 to escape or chase
Weave basic attacks between skills for maximum damage

skills.name: Quick Draw
skills.description: Clint fires a bullet in a straight line, dealing physical damage to enemies hit. The bullet explodes at max range.

skills.name: Trapping Recoil
skills.description: Clint dashes backward while firing a trap that slows enemies hit. The next basic attack is enhanced.

skills.name: Grenade Bombardment
skills.description: Clint fires 5 grenades in a cone, each dealing physical damage. Grenades at the center deal more damage.

skills.name: Double Shot
skills.description: After using a skill, Clint's next basic attack will be enhanced, dealing extra physical damage and having increased range.

combos.name: Harass Combo
combos.description: Safe poke combo for lane harassment.

combos.name: Burst Combo
combos.description: Maximum burst combo utilizing all enhanced basic attacks.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Clint's original appearance as the frontier gunslinger.

skins.name: Rock and Roll
skins.description: A rock star-themed skin with musical effects.

skins.name: Blazing West
skins.description: A wild west-themed skin with fiery effects.

trivia: Clint was one of the first skill-based marksmen in MLBB
His playstyle is similar to Lucian from League of Legends
He received a major visual update in 2019

heroes.name: Rafaela
heroes.lore: Rafaela is an angel who descended from the Celestial Palace to heal the wounded and protect the innocent in the Land of Dawn. As a divine healer, she uses her holy powers to mend wounds and smite evil forces that threaten peace.
heroes.background: Once a high-ranking angel in the Celestial Palace, Rafaela chose to descend to the mortal realm to aid humanity in their struggles against darkness. She carries the blessing of light wherever she goes.
heroes.playstyle: Rafaela is a versatile support who provides consistent healing, movement speed buffs, and crowd control. She excels at sustaining her team in prolonged engagements and can also deal respectable magic damage with her skills.

recommendedBuilds.name: Roam Support Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Standard roam build focusing on cooldown reduction and team utility.

recommendedBuilds.name: Damage Support Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Magic damage build for when your team needs additional damage output.

tips: Use Skill 2 to help allies escape or chase
Position carefully in team fights
Use ultimate to interrupt channeling abilities
Prioritize healing carries in fights
Use Skill 1 for vision in bushes

skills.name: Light of Retribution
skills.description: Rafaela fires a holy light that deals magic damage to enemies and reveals their position. The light can bounce between enemies up to 3 times.

skills.name: Holy Healing
skills.description: Rafaela heals herself and nearby allied heroes, while also granting increased movement speed for a short duration.

skills.name: Holy Baptism
skills.description: Rafaela channels holy power in a forward direction, dealing magic damage and stunning enemies hit for 1.5 seconds.

skills.name: Deity Penalization
skills.description: When Rafaela dies, she transforms into pure energy that heals nearby allies and slows nearby enemies. She can still cast her ultimate while in this state.

combos.name: Basic Harass Combo
combos.description: Safe poke combo for lane harassment and sustain.

combos.name: Team Fight Combo
combos.description: Team fight combo focusing on crowd control and sustain.

combos.name: Chase Combo
combos.description: Chasing combo to help secure kills for your team.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Rafaela's original appearance as the celestial healer.

skins.name: Flower Fairy
skins.description: A nature-themed skin with floral effects and animations.

skins.name: Star Chaser
skins.description: A cosmic-themed skin with starry effects and celestial animations.

skins.name: Guardian of the Sky
skins.description: An epic angelic skin with enhanced heavenly effects and animations.

trivia: Rafaela was one of the original heroes in Mobile Legends
She is often recommended as a beginner-friendly support
Her passive allows her to contribute even after death
Rafaela received significant buffs to her healing capabilities over time
She is particularly strong against sustain-based fighters and tanks

heroes.name: Eudora
heroes.lore: Eudora is a powerful sorceress who commands the forces of lightning. As a member of the Magic Academy, she seeks to master all forms of elemental magic.
heroes.background: Eudora was a prodigy at the Magic Academy, showing exceptional talent for lightning magic from a young age. She continues her studies while defending the academy from threats.
heroes.playstyle: Eudora is a burst mage who excels at eliminating single targets with her powerful combo. She relies on positioning and timing to catch enemies off guard.

recommendedBuilds.name: Burst Mage Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Maximum magic power build that oneshots squishy targets.

tips: Use Skill 2 to set up your combo
Save ultimate for high-priority targets
Position safely in team fights

skills.name: Forked Lightning
skills.description: Eudora releases a bolt of lightning that deals magic damage to an enemy. If the target is affected by Electric Shock, the cooldown is reduced.

skills.name: Electric Arrow
skills.description: Eudora fires an electric arrow that stuns the first enemy hit and deals magic damage. Applies Electric Shock to the target.

skills.name: Superconductor
skills.description: Eudora calls down a powerful lightning strike on an enemy hero, dealing massive magic damage. Deals extra damage to targets affected by Electric Shock.

skills.name: Superconductor
skills.description: Eudora's skills apply Electric Shock to enemies, making them take extra damage from her other abilities.

combos.name: One Shot Combo
combos.description: Standard burst combo that eliminates squishy targets.

combos.name: Team Fight Combo
combos.description: Focus fire combo to quickly eliminate key targets in team fights.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Eudora's original appearance as the lightning sorceress.

skins.name: Blazing Force
skins.description: A fiery-themed skin that transforms Eudora's lightning into flames.

trivia: Eudora is often called the 'queen of burst'
Her combo can instantly delete most marksmen and mages
She received visual updates in 2019 that improved her model and effects

heroes.name: Zilong
heroes.lore: Zilong is a skilled spearman from the Cadia Riverlands, known for his incredible speed and martial prowess. He fights to protect his homeland and uphold justice.
heroes.background: Zilong trained since childhood in the ancient martial arts of the Cadia Riverlands. He wields the legendary spear passed down through generations of warriors.
heroes.playstyle: Zilong is a mobile fighter who excels at picking off isolated targets and split pushing. His abilities allow him to quickly engage and disengage from fights.

recommendedBuilds.name: Split Push Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Build focused on dueling and split pushing with good sustain.

tips: Use ultimate to escape dangerous situations
Focus on split pushing and picking off isolated targets

skills.name: Spear Flip
skills.description: Zilong charges toward an enemy, dealing physical damage and flipping them over to the other side.

skills.name: Spear Strike
skills.description: Zilong strikes instantly with his spear, dealing physical damage and slowing the target.

skills.name: Supreme Warrior
skills.description: Zilong removes all slow effects and gains increased attack speed and movement speed. Basic attacks reduce skill cooldowns.

skills.name: Dragon Flurry
skills.description: Every few seconds, Zilong's next basic attack will strike twice. The second strike deals reduced damage.

combos.name: Pick Off Combo
combos.description: Standard combo for catching and eliminating isolated targets.

combos.name: Escape Combo
sequence: Skill 1 on enemy to create distance
combos.description: Defensive combo to escape from dangerous situations.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Zilong's original appearance as the Cadia Riverlands warrior.

skins.name: Fierce Dragon
skins.description: A dragon-themed skin that enhances Zilong's martial arts style.

dialogues.text: Have a taste of my spear!

trivia: Zilong is based on the Chinese historical figure Zhao Yun
He was one of the original free heroes given to new players
His flip ability can be used to save allies by flipping enemies away from them

heroes.name: Fanny
heroes.lore: Fanny is an aerial assassin who uses twin blades and cables to maneuver around the battlefield. She was trained in the ancient martial arts of the Cadia Riverlands.
heroes.background: Fanny is the youngest master of the Cable Technique, a martial art that allows practitioners to swing through the air using energy cables.
heroes.playstyle: Fanny is a high-skill-cap assassin who uses cables to fly around the map. She excels at quickly eliminating targets but requires precise cable management.

recommendedBuilds.name: Damage Assassin Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Standard damage build that provides sustain and burst potential.

tips: Master cable angles and wall positions
Manage energy carefully
Use ultimate to finish targets

skills.name: Tornado Strike
skills.description: Fanny spins her blades, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. Damage increases based on how many cables she's used recently.

skills.name: Steel Cable
skills.description: Fanny fires a cable that attaches to terrain, pulling her toward it. She can store up to 2 cables.

skills.name: Cut Throat
skills.description: Fanny dashes toward an enemy hero, dealing physical damage. If the target is low health, damage is increased.

skills.name: Air Superiority
skills.description: Fanny gains energy regeneration when using cables near enemies. Each cable use increases Tornado Strike damage.

combos.name: Basic Cable Combo
combos.description: Standard cable engagement combo for quick eliminations.

combos.name: Advanced Wall Spam
combos.description: Advanced combo that maximizes Tornado Strike damage through multiple cable uses.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Fanny's original appearance as the aerial assassin.

skins.name: Royal Cavalry
skins.description: A royal guard-themed skin with elegant effects.

skins.name: Skylark
skins.description: A bird-themed skin with graceful aerial effects.

trivia: Fanny is considered the highest skill-cap hero in Mobile Legends
Professional Fanny players can literally fly across the entire map
She has one of the highest ban rates in ranked games

heroes.name: Layla
heroes.lore: Layla is a young girl who wields the ancient and powerful Malefic Gun. Despite her innocent appearance, she possesses immense destructive power that she's still learning to control.
heroes.background: Layla discovered the Malefic Gun in an ancient ruin and formed a bond with the weapon. She now travels the Land of Dawn, trying to understand her connection to the powerful artifact.
heroes.playstyle: Layla is a long-range marksman who deals increasing damage the farther she is from her target. She excels at poking enemies from a safe distance but lacks mobility.

recommendedBuilds.name: Critical Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Standard critical build that maximizes damage output in team fights.

tips: Maintain maximum distance in fights
Use Skill 2 to reveal bushes
Position carefully against assassins

skills.name: Malefic Bomb
skills.description: Layla fires an energy blast that deals physical damage to enemies in a line. Damage increases with distance.

skills.name: Void Projectile
skills.description: Layla fires a void projectile that reveals and slows enemies hit. The explosion deals physical damage to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Destruction Rush
skills.description: Layla charges up and fires a powerful energy beam that deals massive physical damage to enemies in a long line.

skills.name: Malefic Gun
skills.description: Layla's basic attack and skill range increases with level. Her damage increases the farther she is from the target.

combos.name: Poke Combo
combos.description: Safe poke combo from maximum distance.

combos.name: Burst Combo
combos.description: Maximum damage combo for securing kills.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Layla's original appearance with the Malefic Gun.

skins.name: Bunny Babe
skins.description: A cute bunny-themed skin perfect for Easter.

skins.name: Blazing Gun
skins.description: A fiery-themed skin that transforms Layla's gun into a blazing weapon.

trivia: Layla is one of the original heroes and is free for all players
She has the longest basic attack range in the game at max level
Despite being a beginner hero, she can be very powerful in the right hands

heroes.name: Minotaur
heroes.lore: Mino is the chief of the Minotaur tribe from the Azrya Woodlands. He is a fierce warrior who fights to protect his people and their ancestral lands from invaders.
heroes.background: As the guardian of the Sacred Horn, Mino can tap into ancient powers that transform him into an unstoppable force when his rage reaches its peak.
heroes.playstyle: Minotaur is a durable tank who excels at initiating team fights and disrupting enemies. His rage mechanic allows him to transform into a more powerful version of himself with enhanced abilities.

recommendedBuilds.name: Roam Tank Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Standard tank build focusing on crowd control and team fight initiation.

tips: Manage rage bar carefully
Use ultimate when rage is full
Skill 2 can heal allies
Flicker + Ultimate for surprise engages

skills.name: Despair Stomp
skills.description: Mino jumps to a target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies. In rage mode, the damage and slow effect are increased.

skills.name: Motivation Roar
skills.description: Mino roars, healing himself and nearby allies. In rage mode, the heal amount is significantly increased.

skills.name: Minoan Fury
skills.description: Mino unleashes his fury, knocking up nearby enemies and entering rage mode. In rage mode, his skills are enhanced and he gains increased defense.

skills.name: Rage
skills.description: Mino generates rage when dealing or taking damage. When the rage bar is full, he can use his ultimate to enter rage mode. Basic attacks and skills generate more rage in combat.

combos.name: Basic Engage Combo
combos.description: Standard engagement combo for initiating team fights.

combos.name: Flicker Ultimate Combo
combos.description: Surprise engage using Flicker to catch multiple enemies.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Mino's original appearance as the Minotaur chief.

skins.name: Sacred Warrior
skins.description: A sacred guardian themed skin with holy effects.

trivia: Minotaur was one of the first heroes with a transformation mechanic
His rage management is crucial for effective play
He received a visual rework that updated his model and effects

heroes.name: Lolita
heroes.lore: Lolita is a mecha pilot from the advanced city of Eruditio. She controls a powerful combat mech named Nobita, using its advanced technology to protect her allies and control the battlefield.
heroes.background: As one of Eruditio's finest mecha pilots, Lolita combines tactical brilliance with cutting-edge technology to outmaneuver her opponents.
heroes.playstyle: Lolita is a protective tank who excels at blocking projectile attacks and setting up team fights with her crowd control. She is particularly effective against marksman-heavy compositions.

recommendedBuilds.name: Roam Tank Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Standard tank build focusing on protection and crowd control.

tips: Use Skill 2 to block crucial projectiles
Hide ultimate cast with bushes
Combo Skill 1 with ultimate for guaranteed stun
Protect your carries with Skill 2

skills.name: Charge
skills.description: Lolita charges forward, dealing physical damage to enemies in her path and stunning them. If she hits an enemy hero, she can cast the skill again to charge back.

skills.name: Guardian's Barrier
skills.description: Lolita deploys an energy shield that blocks all incoming projectile basic attacks and some projectile skills from the front.

skills.name: Noumenon Energy Blast
skills.description: Lolita charges energy, slowing nearby enemies. After a delay or when released, she unleashes the energy, dealing magic damage and stunning enemies in a large area.

skills.name: Noumenon Energy
skills.description: After using a skill, Lolita's next basic attack deals extra magic damage and stuns enemies. This effect has a short cooldown.

combos.name: Basic Engage Combo
combos.description: Standard engagement combo for team fights.

combos.name: Flicker Ultimate Combo
combos.description: Surprise engage using Flicker to reposition during ultimate charge.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Lolita's original appearance as the mecha pilot.

skins.name: Sanguine Rose
skins.description: An elegant gothic-themed skin with rose petal effects.

trivia: Lolita is one of the few heroes who can reliably block projectile attacks
Her ultimate requires careful timing and positioning
She is particularly strong in the current meta against popular marksmen

heroes.name: Hayabusa
heroes.lore: Hayabusa is the last heir of the Shadow Sect, a clan of elite ninjas. He wields the power of shadows and seeks to restore his clan's honor while hunting down those who destroyed it.
heroes.background: As a master of shadow techniques, Hayabusa can manipulate shadows to teleport and unleash devastating attacks on his enemies.
heroes.playstyle: Hayabusa is a high-mobility assassin who excels at split-pushing and eliminating single targets. His shadow teleportation allows him to engage and disengage with precision.

recommendedBuilds.name: Jungle Assassin Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Standard jungle build focusing on burst damage and sustain.

tips: Use shadows to dodge crucial skills
Combo ultimate on isolated targets
Split-push to create pressure
Use Skill 2 to escape dangerous situations

skills.name: Shuriken
skills.description: Hayabusa throws three shurikens in a cone, dealing physical damage to enemies hit. Each shuriken deals more damage to isolated targets.

skills.name: Quad Shadow
skills.description: Hayabusa releases four shadows in different directions. He can teleport to any shadow within a time limit. Shadows deal physical damage to enemies they pass through.

skills.name: Ougi: Shadow Kill
skills.description: Hayabusa becomes untargetable and dashes between enemies multiple times, dealing physical damage. Deals more damage to isolated targets.

skills.name: Shadows Heal
skills.description: Hayabusa's skills restore energy when they hit enemies. Basic attacks against enemies affected by his skills also restore energy.

combos.name: Basic Burst Combo
combos.description: Standard burst combo for eliminating single targets.

combos.name: Advanced Shadow Combo
combos.description: Advanced combo utilizing multiple shadow teleports for maximum damage and mobility.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Hayabusa's original appearance as the Shadow Sect heir.

skins.name: Shadow of Oblivion
skins.description: A dark-themed skin with enhanced shadow effects.

trivia: Hayabusa is considered one of the most difficult heroes to master
His ultimate deals significantly more damage to isolated targets
He is one of the best split-pushers in the game
Professional players often use him in high-level tournaments

heroes.name: Freya
heroes.lore: Freya is the Valkyrie of the Moniyan Empire, a legendary warrior blessed by the gods. She descends from the heavens to punish evildoers and protect the innocent with her sacred sword and shield.
heroes.background: As a divine warrior, Freya combines heavenly power with masterful combat skills to strike down her enemies with righteous fury.
heroes.playstyle: Freya is a burst fighter who excels at jumping into fights and eliminating key targets. Her ultimate transforms her into a more powerful state with enhanced abilities.

recommendedBuilds.name: Damage Fighter Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Standard damage build focusing on burst potential and sustain.

tips: Use ultimate before engaging
Combo skills with basic attacks
Save Skill 1 for escaping
Target squishy heroes first

skills.name: Leap of Faith
skills.description: Freya leaps to a target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies. In Valkyrie state, the damage and slow are increased.

skills.name: Spirit Combo
skills.description: Freya performs a two-part attack. First strike deals physical damage, second strike deals more damage and knocks up enemies. In Valkyrie state, both strikes are enhanced.

skills.name: Valkyrie Descent
skills.description: Freya transforms into her Valkyrie state, enhancing her basic attacks and skills. She gains a shield and her attacks deal splash damage.

skills.name: Power of Einherjar
skills.description: After using skills, Freya's next basic attack deals bonus physical damage. Hitting enemy heroes with skills reduces all cooldowns by 1 second.

combos.name: Basic Burst Combo
combos.description: Standard burst combo with ultimate active.

combos.name: Engage Combo
combos.description: Engagement combo for initiating fights.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Freya's original appearance as the Valkyrie.

skins.name: Dragon Hunter
skins.description: A dragon slayer themed skin with fiery effects.

trivia: Freya was one of the first transformation-based fighters
She received a significant rework that improved her gameplay
Her ultimate state makes her significantly more powerful in fights

heroes.name: Gord
heroes.lore: Gord is a brilliant scientist from Eruditio who discovered how to manipulate Mystic energy. He uses his scientific knowledge to control magical forces with precision and calculation.
heroes.background: As the foremost expert on Mystic energy, Gord combines scientific principles with magical power to unleash devastating attacks on his enemies.
heroes.playstyle: Gord is a burst mage who excels at poking enemies from distance and dealing massive magic damage with his ultimate. He relies on skillshots and positioning to be effective.

recommendedBuilds.name: Burst Mage Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Standard burst build focusing on maximum magic damage output.

tips: Use Skill 2 to set up Skill 1
Position carefully before using ultimate
Combo passive stacks for maximum damage
Use Flicker to reposition during ultimate

skills.name: Mystic Projectile
skills.description: Gord fires a mystic projectile that deals magic damage to enemies hit and slows them. The projectile explodes at max range or when it hits an enemy hero.

skills.name: Mystic Injunction
skills.description: Gord creates a mystic zone that deals magic damage over time to enemies inside. The zone lasts for several seconds and applies a slow.

skills.name: Mystic Gush
skills.description: Gord channels a powerful beam of mystic energy, dealing continuous magic damage to enemies in a line. The beam's direction can be adjusted slowly during channeling.

skills.name: Mystic Favor
skills.description: Gord's skills apply mystic marks to enemies. After 3 marks, the enemy takes extra true damage and is stunned for 1 second.

combos.name: Basic Burst Combo
combos.description: Standard burst combo using all skills for maximum damage.

combos.name: Team Fight Combo
combos.description: Team fight combo focusing on hitting multiple targets.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Gord's original appearance as the Mystic scientist.

skins.name: Professor Prof.
skins.description: A mad scientist themed skin with laboratory effects.

trivia: Gord's ultimate can be devastating in team fights when positioned correctly
He requires good positioning and protection from allies
His passive stun is crucial for setting up his ultimate
Gord is particularly strong against tanky compositions

heroes.name: Natalia
heroes.lore: Natalia is the Ghost Hand of the Moniyan Empire, an elite assassin trained in stealth and infiltration. She operates from the shadows to eliminate high-value targets with deadly precision.
heroes.background: As the empire's most feared assassin, Natalia moves unseen and strikes without warning, leaving no trace of her presence except for her victims.
heroes.playstyle: Natalia is a stealth assassin who excels at ambushing isolated targets and disrupting enemy formations. Her invisibility allows her to move around the map undetected.
pros: Excellent at picking off isolated targets

recommendedBuilds.name: Jungle Assassin Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Standard jungle build focusing on burst damage and mobility.

tips: Use bushes to maintain invisibility
Target isolated squishy heroes
Use smoke bomb to escape dangerous situations
Coordinate with team for ganks

skills.name: Claw Dash
skills.description: Natalia dashes forward, dealing physical damage to enemies in her path. If she hits an enemy hero, the cooldown is reduced.

skills.name: Smoke Bomb
skills.description: Natalia throws a smoke bomb that creates an area of smoke. Enemies inside are silenced and Natalia gains increased attack speed while in the smoke.

skills.name: The Hunt
skills.description: Natalia enters stealth mode after being out of combat for a few seconds. While stealthed, she gains increased movement speed and her next basic attack will backstab the enemy, dealing extra damage.

skills.name: Cold-blooded Strangling
skills.description: Natalia's basic attacks from behind deal extra damage. When she eliminates an enemy hero, all her skill cooldowns are reset.

combos.name: Basic Ambush Combo
combos.description: Standard ambush combo for eliminating isolated targets.

combos.name: Team Fight Combo
combos.description: Team fight combo focusing on silencing multiple enemies and disrupting formations.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Natalia's original appearance as the Ghost Hand.

skins.name: Phantom Dame
skins.description: An elegant phantom-themed skin with ghostly effects.

trivia: Natalia is one of the most banned heroes in ranked games
Her permanent stealth makes her extremely frustrating to play against
She excels at picking off squishy backline heroes
Natalia requires excellent map awareness and game sense to play effectively

heroes.name: Kagura
heroes.lore: Kagura is a shrine maiden from the Cadia Riverlands who wields the sacred Seimei Umbrella. As a descendant of the Seimei clan, she commands powerful yin-yang magic to purify evil spirits and maintain balance in the world.
heroes.background: Trained in the ancient arts of onmyoji magic, Kagura uses her mystical umbrella to control the battlefield with precise magical attacks and strategic positioning.
heroes.playstyle: Kagura is a high-skill mage who excels at poking, bursting, and outplaying enemies. She uses her umbrella as both a weapon and a tactical tool, requiring excellent positioning and timing to master.

recommendedBuilds.name: Burst Mage Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Standard burst build focusing on maximum magic damage output and umbrella combos.

tips: Master umbrella positioning
Use Skill 2 for mobility and purification
Combo skills with umbrella recalls
Save ultimate for key targets

skills.name: Seimei Umbrella Open
skills.description: Kagura throws her umbrella in a target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies along the path. The umbrella remains at the endpoint and can be recalled.

skills.name: Rasho Umbrella Flee
skills.description: Kagura teleports to her umbrella's location, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and gaining a shield. If the umbrella is with her, she dashes in a designated direction instead.

skills.name: Yin Yang Overturn
skills.description: With umbrella: Kagura opens her umbrella, dealing magic damage and pulling enemies toward it. Without umbrella: She creates a field around herself that deals continuous damage.

skills.name: Yin Yang Gathering
skills.description: Every time Kagura's skills hit an enemy, she restores mana. After using a skill, her next basic attack deals extra magic damage.

combos.name: Basic Burst Combo
combos.description: Standard burst combo using all skills with umbrella positioning.

combos.name: Team Fight Combo
combos.description: Team fight combo focusing on disrupting enemy formations.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Kagura's original appearance as the shrine maiden.

skins.name: Flower Season
skins.description: A cherry blossom themed skin with floral effects.

dialogues.text: The balance of yin and yang!

trivia: Kagura is considered one of the most difficult heroes to master
Her umbrella mechanics require excellent spatial awareness
She has one of the highest skill ceilings in the game
Professional players often showcase incredible outplays with Kagura

heroes.name: Chou
heroes.lore: Chou is a rebellious martial artist who left his traditional dojo to pursue his own path. He combines incredible martial arts skills with a carefree attitude, fighting for justice in his own unique way.
heroes.background: As a master of Jeet Kune Do, Chou uses his incredible agility and powerful kicks to control the battlefield and take down his opponents.
heroes.playstyle: Chou is a mobile fighter who excels at crowd control and picking off key targets. His combination of dashes, immunity, and powerful kicks makes him extremely versatile.
pros: Immune to crowd control during skills

recommendedBuilds.name: Damage Fighter Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Damage-focused build for the exp lane, maximizing burst potential.

recommendedBuilds.name: Tank Roam Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Tank build for roaming, focusing on crowd control and initiation.

tips: Use Skill 2 to immune crowd control
Combo Skill 1 properly for maximum damage
Use ultimate to kick enemies into your team
Master Flicker + Ultimate combo

skills.name: Jeet Kune Do
skills.description: Chou dashes forward, dealing physical damage. Can be cast three times with different effects: first slows, second knocks up, third dashes and knocks back.

skills.name: Shunpo
skills.description: Chou dashes in a designated direction, becoming immune to crowd control during the dash. His next basic attack is enhanced.

skills.name: The Way of Dragon
skills.description: Chou kicks an enemy hero, dealing physical damage and stunning them. He can then use the skill again to kick the enemy in a target direction.

skills.name: Only Fast
skills.description: Chou's basic attacks deal extra physical damage after using skills. Each skill use enhances his next basic attack.

combos.name: Basic Combo
combos.description: Standard combo for engaging and locking down targets.

combos.name: Flicker Kick Combo
combos.description: Advanced combo using Flicker to reposition for ultimate.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Chou's original appearance as the rebellious martial artist.

skins.name: King of Fighters
skins.description: A collaboration skin with the King of Fighters franchise.

trivia: Chou is one of the most popular heroes in professional play
His Skill 2 makes him immune to all crowd control during the dash
The Flicker + Ultimate combo is iconic and game-changing
He can be built as both damage dealer and tank

heroes.name: Sun
heroes.lore: Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, is a legendary warrior from Eastern mythology. After achieving immortality and causing chaos in the heavens, he now travels the Land of Dawn seeking new challenges and adventures.
heroes.background: Wielding his magical Ruyi Jingu Bang staff, Sun can create clones of himself to confuse and overwhelm his enemies in battle.
heroes.playstyle: Sun is a split-push fighter who excels at creating pressure across the map. His clone mechanics allow him to quickly clear lanes and take objectives while being elusive.

recommendedBuilds.name: Split Push Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Attack speed build focused on split-pushing and taking objectives quickly.

tips: Focus on split-pushing
Use clones to scout bushes
Avoid team fights when possible
Take turtle and lord with clones

skills.name: Instantaneous Move
skills.description: Sun dashes to a target location, leaving a clone behind. The clone will attack nearby enemies.

skills.name: Magic Power Wave
skills.description: Sun slams his staff to the ground, dealing physical damage to enemies in a cone and slowing them.

skills.name: Clone Techniques
skills.description: Sun creates two clones that mimic his actions and deal reduced damage. The clones last for several seconds.

skills.name: Real Monkey
skills.description: Sun and his clones' basic attacks mark enemies. When stacked to 3 marks, they explode dealing physical damage.

combos.name: Basic Split Push
combos.description: Standard split-push combo for taking objectives quickly.

combos.name: Fight Combo
combos.description: Fighting combo when forced into combat.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Sun's original appearance as the Monkey King.

skins.name: Viceroy
skins.description: A royal-themed skin with elegant effects.

trivia: Sun is based on the Chinese mythological character Sun Wukong
His clone mechanics make him excellent at split-pushing
He received a major rework that improved his gameplay
Sun is particularly strong at taking down turrets quickly

heroes.name: Alpha
heroes.lore: Alpha is a combat android created by Eruditio's top scientists. Originally designed for peacekeeping, he gained sentience and now fights to protect humanity from technological threats.
heroes.background: As an advanced AI in a mechanical body, Alpha combines cutting-edge technology with combat programming to overwhelm his enemies with precise attacks.
heroes.playstyle: Alpha is a sustain fighter who excels at prolonged engagements. His skills allow him to deal continuous damage while regenerating health, making him difficult to take down.

recommendedBuilds.name: Sustain Fighter Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Sustain-focused build that maximizes Alpha's durability and damage output.

tips: Use Skill 2 for sustain in fights
Combo skills with basic attacks
Use ultimate to initiate or escape
Build cooldown reduction for more skill usage

skills.name: Rotary Impact
skills.description: Alpha spins his blades, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. Hitting enemies with this skill reduces its cooldown.

skills.name: Force Swing
skills.description: Alpha fires an energy ball that deals physical damage to enemies in a line and slows them. Hitting enemies restores Alpha's HP.

skills.name: Spear of Alpha
skills.description: Alpha dashes to a target location, dealing physical damage to enemies along the path and knocking them up. He then slams down, dealing additional damage.

skills.name: Beta, Advance!
skills.description: Alpha's skills mark enemies with stacks. When he basic attacks marked enemies, he deals extra true damage and reduces his skill cooldowns.

combos.name: Basic Engage Combo
combos.description: Standard engagement combo for initiating fights.

combos.name: Sustain Combo
combos.description: Sustain combo for prolonged fights and trading.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Alpha's original appearance as the combat android.

skins.name: Mecha Dragon
skins.description: A dragon-themed mecha skin with fiery effects.

trivia: Alpha was one of the first android-themed heroes
His passive allows him to reduce skill cooldowns quickly
He received significant buffs that improved his viability
Alpha is particularly strong in extended 1v1 situations

heroes.name: Ruby
heroes.lore: Ruby is a vampire huntress who wields a giant scythe. Despite her youthful appearance, she is a seasoned warrior who hunts the creatures of the night.
heroes.background: Ruby comes from a long line of vampire hunters. She took up the family legacy after her parents were killed by vampires and now seeks to eradicate the vampire threat.
heroes.playstyle: Ruby is a lifesteal-based fighter who excels at crowd control and sustained combat. Her skills provide multiple dashes and area control.

recommendedBuilds.name: Lifesteal Tank Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Build focused on maximizing lifesteal and durability.

tips: Use dashes to reposition in fights
Time ultimate to catch multiple enemies
Build lifesteal for sustain

skills.name: Be Good!
skills.description: Ruby dashes in the specified direction, dealing physical damage to enemies along the way. Hitting an enemy reduces the cooldown.

skills.name: Don't Run, Wolf King!
skills.description: Ruby swings her scythe, dealing physical damage to enemies in a cone and stunning them.

skills.name: I'm Offended!
skills.description: Ruby swings her scythe in a large area, pulling enemies toward her and dealing physical damage.

skills.name: Let's Dance!
skills.description: Ruby's skills grant her lifesteal. Each skill use enhances her next basic attack with extra lifesteal.

combos.name: Engage Combo
combos.description: Aggressive engagement combo that catches multiple enemies.

combos.name: Peel Combo
combos.description: Defensive combo to protect carries from assassins.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Ruby's original appearance as the vampire huntress.

skins.name: Zombie Nurse
skins.description: A spooky zombie nurse skin perfect for Halloween.

skins.name: Cat Girl
skins.description: A cute cat girl skin with playful effects.

trivia: Ruby was one of the first heroes with spammable dash abilities
Her lifesteal passive makes her incredibly durable in extended fights
She received a major visual update in 2021

heroes.name: Yi Sun-shin
heroes.lore: Yi Sun-shin is a legendary admiral from the Cadia Riverlands, renowned for his naval victories and tactical brilliance. He commands both land and sea with his versatile combat style.
heroes.background: As a master of both archery and swordsmanship, Yi Sun-shin adapts his fighting style based on the situation, making him unpredictable and deadly.
heroes.playstyle: Yi Sun-shin is a unique marksman who can switch between ranged and melee combat. His ultimate provides global presence, allowing him to influence battles across the map.

recommendedBuilds.name: Critical Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Critical strike build that maximizes damage output in both ranged and melee forms.

recommendedBuilds.name: Jungle Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Jungle build focusing on clear speed and ganking potential.

tips: Switch forms based on situation
Use ultimate to scout or secure kills
Master the Skill 1 dash timing
Use melee form for close combat

skills.name: Traceless
skills.description: Yi Sun-shin dashes in a designated direction. If he is in ranged form, he switches to melee form and vice versa. The dash can be used to pass through thin walls.

skills.name: Blood Floods
skills.description: Ranged: Yi Sun-shin fires a wave of arrows in a cone. Melee: He swings his sword in an arc, dealing physical damage to enemies in front.

skills.name: Mountain Shocker
skills.description: Yi Sun-shin commands 5 warships to bombard locations across the map. Each bombardment reveals the area and deals physical damage to enemies hit.

skills.name: Heavenly Vow
skills.description: Yi Sun-shin has two attack modes. Ranged: Basic attacks are long-range arrows. Melee: Basic attacks are short-range sword swings that deal extra damage. Every third basic attack in either form is enhanced.

combos.name: Ranged Combo
combos.description: Ranged combat combo for kiting and poking.

combos.name: Melee Combo
sequence: Skill 1 to switch back to ranged
combos.description: Melee combat combo for close-quarters fighting.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Yi Sun-shin's original appearance as the legendary admiral.

skins.name: Furious Tide
skins.description: A naval-themed skin with water and wave effects.

dialogues.text: For the glory of Cadia Riverlands!

trivia: Yi Sun-shin is based on the real historical Korean admiral
He is the only hero who can switch between ranged and melee combat
His ultimate provides global map presence
Mastering his form switching is crucial for effective play

heroes.name: Moskov
heroes.lore: Moskov is a cursed spearman from the Abyss who sold his soul for power. He wields the deadly Abyssal Spear, seeking to drag more souls into darkness with him.
heroes.background: Consumed by darkness, Moskov uses his supernatural spear to pierce through enemies and claim their souls for the Abyss.
heroes.playstyle: Moskov is a high-risk, high-reward marksman who excels at dealing massive damage through walls and stunning multiple enemies. His attack speed scaling makes him deadly in late game.

recommendedBuilds.name: Critical Strike Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Critical strike build that maximizes Moskov's attack speed and damage output.

tips: Use Skill 2 to stun enemies against walls
Position carefully to attack through walls
Use ultimate to finish off fleeing enemies
Build attack speed for passive reduction

skills.name: Abyss Walker
skills.description: Moskov dashes in a designated direction, enhancing his next basic attack to reduce all skill cooldowns by 1 second.

skills.name: Spear of Death
skills.description: Moskov throws his spear, dealing physical damage to enemies in a line and stunning them if they hit a wall or are at max range.

skills.name: Spear of Destruction
skills.description: Moskov throws a powerful spear that travels across the map, dealing physical damage to enemies hit. Damage increases based on enemies' lost HP.

skills.name: Spear of Quiescence
skills.description: Moskov's basic attacks pierce through enemies, dealing damage to all targets behind them. Each basic attack reduces the cooldown of Spear of Death by 0.5 seconds.

combos.name: Basic Combo
combos.description: Standard combo for trading and farming.

combos.name: Wall Stun Combo
combos.description: Advanced combo using walls to guarantee stuns.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Moskov's original appearance as the cursed spearman.

skins.name: Lightborn
skins.description: A holy warrior themed skin that contrasts with Moskov's dark origins.

trivia: Moskov's passive allows him to hit multiple targets with basic attacks
He is one of the best late-game marksmen in Mobile Legends
His Skill 2 can stun enemies for a long duration when positioned correctly
Moskov's ultimate can snipe low-health enemies across the map

heroes.name: Johnson
heroes.lore: Johnson is a mechanical engineer who built himself a powerful suit of armor. He fights to protect the innocent using his technological prowess.
heroes.background: Johnson was a brilliant engineer who created the ultimate defensive suit after his hometown was destroyed. He now uses his invention to prevent similar tragedies.
heroes.playstyle: Johnson is a unique tank who can transform into a car and drive around the map with a passenger. His ultimate provides incredible map mobility and initiation.

recommendedBuilds.name: Roam Tank Build
recommendedBuilds.description: Standard roam build that maximizes durability and utility.

tips: Coordinate ultimate with allies
Use walls to steer during ultimate
Practice driving routes

skills.name: Rapid Touchdown
skills.description: Johnson throws a mechanical fist that deals magic damage to enemies hit and stuns them.

skills.name: Electro-Armor
skills.description: Johnson activates his armor, gaining a shield and dealing magic damage to nearby enemies. The shield explodes when broken.

skills.name: Driving Missile
skills.description: Johnson transforms into a car and drives around. He can pick up one ally. Colliding with enemies deals magic damage and stuns them.

skills.name: J-Tech
skills.description: Johnson gains extra armor and magic resistance. After not taking damage for a while, he gains a shield.

combos.name: Drive-by Gank
combos.description: Standard gank combo using ultimate for initiation.

combos.name: Team Transport
combos.description: Team fight initiation that brings a key ally into the fight.

skins.name: Default
skins.description: Johnson's original appearance as the mechanical engineer.

skins.name: Forkmaster
skins.description: A forklift-themed skin with industrial effects.

skins.name: Mecha Dragon
skins.description: A dragon-themed mecha skin with fiery effects.

trivia: Johnson's ultimate is one of the most unique abilities in MOBA games
He can transport any ally, making for creative combinations
Professional teams use Johnson for surprise global ganks
